Chennai, capital of southeast Indian state Tamil Nadu 泰米爾納德邦|泰米尔纳德邦[Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1]/formerly called Madras 馬德拉斯|马德拉斯[Ma3 de2 la1 si1]

sentences.english: My father was then bed-ridden at Chinsurah.
sentences.chinese: 那時父親已在欽蘇拉臥牀不起了。

sentences.english: The businessman Kia Joorabchian has a 50% stake in the player.
sentences.chinese: 商人霍拉布欽擁有拉米雷斯50%所有權。

sentences.english: Dr. Chen and another hospital doctor say Mr. Yang’s condition has now stabilized.
sentences.chinese: 陳博士和另一位醫生說，楊家欽的病情目前已經穩定。

sentences.english: The Tmperial Board of Astronomy was a research institution on astronomy and calendar in the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 清代欽天監是專門研究天文曆法的重要機構。

sentences.english: Chinko says if he could, he'd find another job.
sentences.chinese: 欽擴說如果可能，他寧願找其他的工作。

sentences.english: The newly-elected head teacher for this school year is Shu-Chin Chung.
sentences.chinese: 本學年的首席教師代表是鍾淑欽。

sentences.english: Bacteria regrowth in distribution system is an important factor for drinking water pollution.
sentences.chinese: 配水管網中細菌繁殖是欽用水二次污染的重要方面。

sentences.english: Capuchin monkeys are the smartest monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 卡布欽猴是最聰明的猴子。

sentences.english: Trencianske Teplice has a character of purely spa town.
sentences.chinese: 特倫欽溫泉區是一個純粹的水療城鎮。

sentences.english: Samphire was upon it instantly and beat it to death with the oar.
sentences.chinese: 巴奇欽跳到章魚的背上，用船槳打死了它。

sentences.english: Mr. Yang's younger brother was assigned to watch him.
sentences.chinese: 因此，楊家欽的弟弟一直監視着他。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
